dataSourceScript.createTableScript: CREATE TABLE CORE_CONFIG_CONTEXT( ID VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, SYSTEMID VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, KEYNAME VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, VALUE VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR2(512), CREATEDATE TIMESTAMP, LASTUPDATEDATE TIMESTAMP, VALIDATEEXPRESSION VARCHAR2(128), PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IDX_CORE_CONF_CONT_00 ON CORE_CONFIG_CONTEXT(KEY,SYSTEMID);

CREATE TABLE CORE_CONFIG_CONTEXT( ID VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, SYSTEMID VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, KEYNAME VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, VALUE VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR2(512), CREATEDATE TIMESTAMP, LASTUPDATEDATE TIMESTAMP, VALIDATEEXPRESSION VARCHAR2(128), PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IDX_CORE_CONF_CONT_00 ON CORE_CONFIG_CONTEXT(KEY,SYSTEMID);

CREATE TABLE CORE_CONFIG_CONTEXT( ID VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, SYSTEMID VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, KEYNAME VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, VALUE VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(512), CREATEDATE TIMESTAMP, LASTUPDATEDATE TIMESTAMP, VALIDATEEXPRESSION VARCHAR(128), PRIMARY KEY(ID) ); CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IDX_CORE_CONF_CONT_00 ON CORE_CONFIG_CONTEXT(KEY,SYSTEMID);
